subSubSection.paragraph: We do not follow the Catalog of Fishes, but follow Kottelat (2006) in the nomenclature of this species. This taxon is identical with Phoxinus lagowskii steindachneri of Hosoya (2013) , and was recorded from lotic waters and the inlets to some lentic waters.
